title: Ornn Ultimate + Yasuo Windwall
body: So apparently Yasuo's windwall blocks his Ram even though it is not technically a missile attack; it is a moving object. If it followed this logic anyone with a dash would get stopped by his windwall.

replies.body: Champions aren't projectiles. Anything else in the game that moves from one place to another with a travel time is, and Yasuo's windwall (and Braum Unbreakable) will block it
Then treat it as an champion. The thing literally walks on its feet. It is not a projectile

But Ram is ult and Yauso W is not. It's not about logic or game coding, it's about balance.
Yasuo W CD - 26 -> 18 seconds
Ornn R CD - 140 -> 100 seconds.
Well sorry to tell you this but this is not a bug.
Do mean the ram(animal shape) or his dash.
TouchFluffyTail has got it. Doesn't matter what Orn's ult looks like; it's a projectile, just like a bunch of other ults.
